--connect.help: If set to true, the client will attempt to connect to the specified VPN server.

--server.help: If set to true, the VPN server will start and be ready to accept client connections.

--host.help: This command is used for both the server and the client to define the IP address of the VPN server to connect to or mount.

--port.help: This command is used for both the server and the client to define the port for connecting or mounting the VPN server

--interface.help: This command allows you to define the name of the network interface that will be used for the VPN connection.

--api-port.help: This command allows you to define the port on which the VPN serverâ€™s API will run.
